label: SpecifiedMethod
comment: A defined way of performing something.

datatypeProperties.comment: A certification identifier of this specified method.
The code specifying the certification type of this method.
An external reference, expressed as text, for this specified method.
Information, expressed as text, concerning the transport of these dangerous goods.
The code specifying the local type for this method.
The code specifying the measurement for this method.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The code specifying the obligatory type for this method.
The code specifying the standard type for this method.
The code specifying the technology used by this method.

objectProperties.comment: A parameter applicable to this specified method.

referencedBy.comment: A method specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
